oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Development and current situation of organic agriculture in Brazil and the State of Sao Paulo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Abreu, Lucimar Santiago de
Kledal, Paul Rye
Pettan, Klebber
Rabello, Fernando
Mendes, Sergio C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Brazil
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A description of the organic production in Brazil as well as an in-depth analysis of the organic sector in the State of Sao Paulo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Abreu, Lucimar Santiago de; Kledal, Paul Rye; Pettan, Klebber; Rabello, Fernando and Mendes, Sergio C. (2008) Development and current situation of organic agriculture in Brazil and the State of Sao Paulo. Working paper.
